text: E. J. Su is an American comic book artist and penciller. He was born in Taiwan and moved to the United States at the age of 14. He is best known for his work on IDW Publishing's Transformers (2005) comic book. He has also worked for Image Comics on Tech Jacket (2002), a six-issue limited series, with writer Robert Kirkman. ==References== ==External links== * Prototype Garage Official blogsite * EJ-Su at deviantART Category:American comics artists Category:American people of Taiwanese descent Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: E. J. Su
